meanings.definition: The quality or state of being current or present.
meanings.sent1: The nownesses of the news articles kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the nownesses of technology in our daily lives.
meanings.sent3: The nownesses of the fashion trends always keep me on my toes.
meanings.sent4: Her nownesses in decision-making made her a reliable team leader.
meanings.sent5: The nownesses of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: The state of existing or occurring at the present time.
meanings.sent1: We need to embrace the nownesses of our current situation.
meanings.sent2: The nownesses of the music industry are constantly evolving.
meanings.sent3: The nownesses of the traffic jam made everyone late for work.
meanings.sent4: His nownesses in sports made him a popular figure in the community.
meanings.sent5: The nownesses of the storm brought heavy rain and strong winds.
